name: Dolly Rogers
tagline: The best creative folk in town.
description:
Dolly Rogers offers creative consultancy and global marketing direction for international youth culture, fashion and lifestyle brands.
Our portfolio includes positioning the largest electronic music festival on the planet; Tomorrowland and sister company Mysteryland; designing the award winning WeTransfer identity and UI design; helping MTV seduce their fans and raising awareness for masculinity and Movember.
